mxTextCell.title: Text
mxTextCell.label: The health system tracks the players hit points. The Player HP pool is drained depending on the damage number generated from the damage system. If the players has lost more than the  value of the health potion it will trigger a health potion to be converted in health points on the players HP.
mxTextCell.prevLabel: The health system tracks the players hit points. The Player HP pool is drained depending on the damage number generated from the damage system. If the players has lost more than the  value of the health potion it will trigger a health potion to be converted in health points on the players HP.

mxTextCell.title: Text
mxTextCell.label: This damage system introduces a random amount of damage that the player deals to each enemy. It also randomises the damage that the player recieves based on the attack strength of the enemy. The players damage amount can increase as they progress in the game from the progression system which increases the damage that the player does each hit.
mxTextCell.prevLabel: This damage system introduces a random amount of damage that the player deals to each enemy. It also randomises the damage that the player recieves based on the attack strength of the enemy. The players damage amount can increase as they progress in the game from the progression system which increases the damage that the player does each hit.

mxTextCell.title: Text
mxTextCell.label: This is the main game battle. As the player progresses the number of enemies that the player fights during the encounters increases. There is some additional logic that feedsback into the Main game loop so that the player token stays in the fighting encounter until they have finished the battle.
mxTextCell.prevLabel: This is the main game battle. As the player progresses the number of enemies that the player fights during the encounters increases. There is some additional logic that feedsback into the Main game loop so that the player token stays in the fighting encounter until they have finished the battle.

mxTextCell.title: Text
mxTextCell.label: This is our simulation of the tutorial stage of our game. When the player first starts the game they have to beat six enemies which they battle one at a time. Each enemy spawned creates a health value and a damage value. Once the enemy health drops to zero the damage is also dropped to zero. Once the player has killed all 6 enemies the player will progress to the main game. The total Tutorial counter tracks how much damage the player recieves during the tutorial stage.
mxTextCell.prevLabel: This is our simulation of the tutorial stage of our game. When the player first starts the game they have to beat six enemies which they battle one at a time. Each enemy spawned creates a health value and a damage value. Once the enemy health drops to zero the damage is also dropped to zero. Once the player has killed all 6 enemies the player will progress to the main game. The total Tutorial counter tracks how much damage the player recieves during the tutorial stage.

mxTextCell.title: Text
mxTextCell.label: This is our main game core loop. Once the player has completed the tutorial they enter the main game loop. The player then has a 70/30% chance of either exploring the open world where they might find items or triggering a random encounter which trigger a battle in the Main Game Battle.
mxTextCell.prevLabel: This is our main game core loop. Once the player has completed the tutorial they enter the main game loop. The player then has a 70/30% chance of either exploring the open world where they might find items or triggering a random encounter which trigger a battle in the Main Game Battle.

mxTextCell.title: Text
mxTextCell.label: This is the crafting section that we built during the Webinar. This has two sections to it. The first stage gives the player a set number of items when they enter the tutorial stage. This allows the player to create a set number of health potions to get them through the tutorial stage. Once the player has completed the tutorial they will find the different ingredients to craft more health packs. We also added a way for the player to find additional health packs by killing enemies by connecting the progression system to the health potions via a converter.
mxTextCell.prevLabel: This is the crafting section that we built during the Webinar. This has two sections to it. The first stage gives the player a set number of items when they enter the tutorial stage. This allows the player to create a set number of health potions to get them through the tutorial stage. Once the player has completed the tutorial they will find the different ingredients to craft more health packs. We also added a way for the player to find additional health packs by killing enemies by connecting the progression system to the health potions via a converter.

mxTextCell.title: Text
mxTextCell.label: This progression system awards the player with 5 token each time they kill an enemy. These will have a 10% chance of becoming a health progression item or a damage progression item. the player can then upgrade their max health or damage for every 5.
mxTextCell.prevLabel: This progression system awards the player with 5 token each time they kill an enemy. These will have a 10% chance of becoming a health progression item or a damage progression item. the player can then upgrade their max health or damage for every 5.
